ISSUE.TITLE: Bug report: `ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE` when sharing text via link
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug When I try to share text via a link, when I try to open the "file" that contains the text, there is an exception and I get an `ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE` error. See log below. ### To reproduce 1. Open the app (v1.15.4 and in the latest commit too) in macOS (not tested on other systems) 2. Click the "Text" button and type something and confirm 3. Click on "Send mode" and select "Share via link" 4. Open the link in the browser 5. You see something like this: ![CleanShot 2024-09-11 at 02 01 38@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/58240d09-86a8-4967-b838-8936f87422e5) 7. Try opening 8. `ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE` error ### Expected behavior No error ### Screenshots _No response_ ### Desktop (please complete the following information) macOS 14.6.1, localsend 1.15.4 ### Smartphone (please complete the following information) -
